name: Darn Tough Good Witch Crew Light Socks - Women's
description: No smoke and mirrors, these shrink-treated, fine-gauge socks are the real deal. The merino blend keeps them itch-free and allows them to breathe. Seamless construction provides a smooth fit and assures no slipping, no bunching, and no blisters.Made of fine gauge merino wool, nylon and Lycra® for coolness in the summer, warmth in winter.Form fit to the contours of your calf, shin and ankle.Elastic arch support is knit in to provide added endurance.Ring toe construction uses terry loops surrounding the toe create a comfortable invisible seam.Darn Tough sources their wool from non-mulesed sheep.
